page.title: 12Brooklands Technical College
page.content: Brooklands Technical College was opened in 1947.There are about 2000 students and 200 teachers. The college spends about 2.5 million pounds a year. Brooklands has several large departments offering both general education courses leading to 'O' and 'A' levels and a wide range of vocational courses. Many students attend on a part-time basis. The most popular subjects are{ {Catering, Computing, Business {Studies}and{Engineering. }For engineering the students have a wide variety of choices. The college has a jet plane, which the students take to pieces and then rebuild for practice. Brooklands has a large computer facility including a main frame with 128 terminals. Courses cost from Â£10 - Â£520 per year depending on the course taken.
